TEXT.BODY: Shr 16 cts vs eight cts Net 4,834,000 vs 2,052,000 Revs 34.9 mln vs 16.0 mln Avg shrs 31.1 mln vs 26.8 mln Nine mths Shr 26 cts vs 13 cts Net 8,006,000 vs 3,310,000 Revs 80.9 mln vs 34.5 mln Avg shrs 30.8 mln vs 26.3 mln NOTE: Share adjusted for two for one stock split.
